ovdesc.p: This application will allow the user to select securities & Portfolios they wish to produce the Integrity Check report This application calls on Verification SC.INTEGRITY$RUN to generate the SC.INTEGRITY report for the selected conditions.

desc.p: This is the ID of the Selection Criteria record for which the Integrity Checks are to be made.
This is the Portfolio number for which the Integrity check is to be made.
Valid Values : 'ALL' - All Portfolios Valid Portfolio Numbers Data input to this field only when SEC.REVIEW is HELD
This is the selection criteria for the Securities to be used for the Integrity Check to be made.

Valid Values : 'ALL' - All Securities selected. 'AUTOMATIC' - Securities for which Price/Yield updated Automatically. 'MANUAL' - for manually updated securities. 'HELD' - for those Securities held by the Bank or Customer of the Bank.
